name: Stylish - Minimal [by daylo]
description:
The companion website for the Stylish extension never looked so fresh.
Please give constructive criticism and requests. :)
No futher support - released under CC0 - see profile

user.name: daylo
user.about: all styles have now been released under CC0 with no futher support. seems like nobody else gave a shit. if you want support check out the dirty code for yourself. bye~

additional_info: Version 1.8 I've hidden the lower left advertisement. I've also adjusted the social sharing tools on the search page to make them more streamlined and prettierified. The screenshots have been updated.
